price: মুছাই ক’লে, ‘সেইটো মই তেতিয়াহে কৰিছিলোঁ, যেতিয়া মই বিভ্ৰান্ত আছিলোঁ’।
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
